name: bc-test-runner
description: Run Business Central AL tests with AI Agent Tool support for automated test iteration

commands.title: BC Test Runner: Run All Tests
BC Test Runner: Execute Tests (Skip Compile/Publish)
BC Test Runner: View Latest Results
BC Test Runner: Open HTML Report
BC Test Runner: Clear Stored Credentials
BC Test Runner: Cancel Running Tests

bcTestRunner.powershellPath.description: Path to PowerShell executable (pwsh or powershell)

bcTestRunner.defaultTimeout.description: Default timeout for test operations in milliseconds (default: 10 minutes)

bcTestRunner.autoOpenReport.description: Automatically open HTML report after test run

bcTestRunner.showProgressNotifications.description: Show progress notifications during test execution

languageModelTools.name: bc-test-run
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Execute full Business Central test pipeline: compile apps, publish to container, run tests, and return results. Use this for complete test iteration cycles.

environment.description: Environment name from bctest.config.json. If not specified, uses defaultEnvironment.

skipCompile.description: Skip compilation phase if apps are already compiled.

skipPublish.description: Skip publishing phase if apps are already published.

languageModelTools.name: bc-test-compile
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Compile Business Central AL apps. Returns compilation success/failure with detailed error messages including file paths and line numbers.

apps.description: Specific app folder names to compile. If not specified, compiles all apps from config.

languageModelTools.name: bc-test-publish
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Publish compiled .app files to Business Central container. Returns publish status and sync results.

languageModelTools.name: bc-test-execute
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Run tests in Business Central container (assumes apps are already published). Returns detailed test results with pass/fail status, durations, and failure details.

codeunitFilter.description: Filter for specific codeunit IDs (e.g., '80002' or '80000..80010').

testMethod.description: Specific test method name to run.

languageModelTools.name: bc-test-results
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Read the latest test results from output folder. Returns structured JSON with test summary, failures, and suggested actions.

resultFile.description: Specific result file to read. If not specified, returns latest results.

languageModelTools.name: bc-test-config
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Read bctest.config.json and list available environments, apps, and current settings.
